definitions: A feminine given name from English.
A low-growing evergreen shrub with small, bell-shaped flowers, typically purple, pink, or white, that grows in heathland and moorland.
A genus of flowering plants in the family Ericaceae, with a single species, Calluna vulgaris.
examples: Heather will be attending the conference.
The hills were covered in purple heather.
Calluna vulgaris is commonly known as heather.
